casebody.data:
Victor L. JORDAN, Sr.
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided March 29, 2017

Craig A. Sullivan, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Margaret Gaffney Radionovas, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Victor L. Jordan, Sr.'s petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 169 Conn. App. 908, 155 A.3d 329 (2016), is denied.
